message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would be invaluable to you. Given its significance and the value it holds for you, I am extending this offer at a price of $13000. This price reflects a strategic balance between ensuring a fair return on my investment while offering you a competitive advantage over other potential buyers. Should you choose to accept this offer, you will not only secure a remarkable asset but also potentially unlock additional benefits exclusive to our transaction. I look forward to discussing the details further and exploring how we can proceed together.
